Name: Shader Mod
Description: Adds shaders to your game (best with max graphics). The command is toggleshader.

Name: Cyclically's Btools
Description: Better btools with Undo & Identify. The command is cycbtools.

Name: Hub Loader
Description: Load specific hubs because why not?

Name: Draggable Chat
Description: Adds a command to make chat draggable and resizable. The command is draggablechat.

Name: Rizzler
Description: Adds a command to open a gui to pick chat lines that help you pick up virtual women. The command is rizz.
